rules.text: Ambush.
If a Ranger is injured, this being gains disconnected.
If there is no active prey and the Whispering Fields is in play, the velox bolts. »» Attach this being facedown to it.
If a Ranger is injured, exhaust this being. »» Suffer 1 injury.
If there is an active card with 2 or more presence, shuffle this being into the path deck. »» Draw 1 path card.
If there is an active predator, exhaust it. »» Add [harm] to this being equal to that predator's presence.
If there is 1 or more [harm] on this being, exhaust each ready Artilope. »» Add 1[harm] to each being, and each Ranger suffers 1 injury.
Response: When you interact with this being, you may discard 1 token from an equipped food to commit 1 effort.
If there is another active predator, exhaust it. »» Add 2[harm] to it and add 2[harm] to this being.
If there is an active food, or you have food equipped, exhaust this being. »» Suffer 1 injury.
FIT + [reason]: Slice and share the tear-inducing vegetable to add 1[harm] to this feature, suffer 1 fatigue, and choose a Ranger. That Ranger soothes 3 fatigue.
If there is an active prey, exhaust it. »» Add [progress] to it and [harm] to this feature, both equal to that prey's presence.
Obstacle.
X is equal to the number of [harm] on this feature.
If there is 1 or more [progress] on this feature, the ground sinks under your feet. »» Discard 1[progress] from and add 1[harm] to this feature.
If there is an active Hungry Scrof, exhaust it. »» Add [progress] to it and [harm] to this feature, both equal to the Scrof's presence.
Response: When you would draw a path card, instead attach it facedown to this feature.
When this feature enters play, draw a path card.
X is equal to twice the number of facedown cards attached to this feature.

AWA + [connection]: Sense the movement in the tall grass to choose a number of attached facedown cards at random equal to your effort and look at them. Choose 1 to put into play. If it has the ambush keyword, treat it as if it does not.
Put a random attached facedown card into play. »» If it has the ambush keyword, suffer 1 injury instead of the fatigue.
